articles.author: Megan Cerullo
articles.title: FDA approves Apple AirPods Pro 2 to be used as hearing aids - CBS News
articles.description: Tech giant's latest AirPods will soon function as hearing aids for people with mild to moderate hearing loss.
articles.content:
Apple AirPods Pro 2 can soon be used as hearing aids, after they received Food and Drug Administration (FDA) clearance, in what experts call a game changer for the hearing aid market.

articles.title: Amyloid Plaques May Not Cause Alzheimer’s: New Research Challenges Decades-Old Theories - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A study shows that rising levels of brain protein Aβ42, not the reduction of amyloid plaques, better explains the cognitive benefits of new Alzheimer’s drugs. This finding challenges the traditional focus on plaques in Alzheimer’s treatment. A new study revea…
articles.content: A study led by UC’s Alberto Espay found that new Alzheimer’s drugs may slow cognitive decline by increasing levels of a key brain protein, Aβ42, rather than just reducing amyloid plaques. The researc… [+5719 chars]
